translations: 棘鳍类热带淡水鱼；丽鱼科鱼

sentences.sentence: Angelfish are an easy-to-keep cichlid species.
sentences.translation: 神仙鱼是易于饲养的慈鲷科鱼种。

sentences.sentence: Angelfish are an easy - to - keep cichlid species.
sentences.translation: 神仙鱼是易于饲养的慈鲷科鱼种。

sentences.sentence: Discus: Belongs to cichlid of tropical fish, but divided in one as per its unique shape.
sentences.translation: 七彩神仙鱼：本属热带鱼中的慈鲷科，因其独特的形态而单列。
